TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It has been defrosted, and you are infected with it.

I wish for a sea of distilled water.

Edited August 20, 2014 by flashcactus
removed strange content-doubling

Granted. It has been defrosted, and you are infected with it.

I wish for a sea of distilled water.

Granted, but somebody pees in it and it get's dirty.

I wish I had an infinite supply of regular plushie Jebediah Kermans.

Granted. However, due to the ramifications of portal technology, infinite gravities go through the Free Jeb-Kerman portal and destroy everything.

I wish for a theoretically infinite supply of regular plushie jebediah kermans.

Granted. Your Jeb plushie is also a tribble.

I wish I could dance.

Granted. Every dance you do raises a graveyard of dead people. All of the dirt ends up crushing modern society. The dead people only rise in a purely literal sense.

I wish for an item purpose redesignation tablet.

Granted. The purpose of any item may now be written on it. However, nobody notices the fact and it doesn't change a thing.

I wish for all my bugs to become self-tracking/fixing

Granted. The purpose of any item may now be written on it. However, nobody notices the fact and it doesn't change a thing.

I wish for all my bugs to become self-tracking/fixing

inert plushie

Granted. All of your bugs are now patched in individual updates that cause save resets.

I wish that I had 100 inert, non-reactive plushie Jebadiah Kermans.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted. It requires batteries that don't exist.

I wish for batteries that don't exist.

Granted, you receive antimatter based batteries...

I wish I was a rich man!

Granted... look up (money was made right on top of you)

I wish for more wishes

Granted, but you may only wish for more wishes...

I wish someone got the fiddler on the roof reference...

Granted, but I don't.

I wish for all 1 cent/ penny coins to be abolished.

Granted, but you must live in Canada. (Seriously, we're in the process of phasing pennies out.)

I wish for a working sonic screwdriver.

Granted: You get a screwdriver that opens screws with sound.

I wish I was a Wi-Fi hot spot, that works only on my stuff.

Granted. You have nothing.

I wish the $1 bill was replaced with a $1 coin.

Granted. Again, you must live in Canada. (We have a sane coin system and polymer bills.)

I wish for turkey dinner.

Granted, as soon as you're done preparing it!

I wish the 0.50$ bill was replaced with a 1$ jeb.

$0.50 bills don't exist?

I wish for page 800 to come by tommorow.

Granted. It came... along with 18.5 million other pages.

I wish for page 771 to come tomorrow.

Granted, but you've missed it.

I wish for additional wishes.

Granted. They are each corrupted horribly.

I wish to have a perfect body.

Granted. The body cannot function without 2,000 potato food unit watts.

I wish for 2,000 potato food units.

Granted. You get 2000 raw, sprouted potatoes.

I wish for 5000.

Granted, but the Internet adds 4001 (for obvious reasons).

I wish English had more definitive rules.
